author: wrowe
msg: Introduce a number of SSLC hints to mod_ssl, including the following
MODSSL_PCHAR_CAST      (for a host of non-void/const sslc values)
modssl_read_bio_cb_fn  (for several callbacks with same prototypes)
And protect us from indetermineant toolkits with

author: wrowe
msg: We presume to HAVE_OPENSSL - we were falling into the SSLC path :-(

author: wrowe
msg: HAVE_SSL_SET_STATE=1 is a product of autoconf for OpenSSL, which we
are missing on Win32.  It's required for renegotiation.
Also provide the openssl-0.9.7 #defines for NO_MD5, NO_IDEA and NO_MDC2
(to allow us to compile with 0.9.7+ sans restricted crypto algorithms.)
